Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Horribly \Hor"ri*bly\, adv. In a manner to excite horror; dreadfully; terribly. [1913 Webster]
horribly adv : of a dreadful kind; "there was a dreadfully bloody accident on the road this morning" [syn: {dreadfully}, {awfully}]
